reference: Ameroiya, Takeshi, The Nonlinear Two-Stage Least Squares Estimator, Journal of Econometrics, 2 (July 1974), 105-110. (a) Fair, Ray C., Effects of Expected Future Government Deficits on Current Economic Activity, NBER Working Paper No. 1293, March 1984. (b) Fair, Ray C., Estimated Trade-Offs between Unemployment and Inflation, NBER Working Paper No. 1377, June 1984. (c).
